about.text_about_2: SCHOOL OF ENGINEERING AND TECHNOLOGY, ACHIEVEMENT AND ORIENTED DEVELOPMENT
about.text_about_summary: It is obvious that Engineering and Technology play a very important role in the industrial development. Tra Vinh University has established the School of Engineering and Technology with four departments, including Information Technology, Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Civil Engineering, and Mechanical Engineering and an Administration Office. The school has 80  fulltime faculty members and staffs who are young, active and inquisitive. Strategically, the school has been carrying out plans for fostering, studying in order to improve its profession. Every year, the school enrolls over 500 new students. Especially, 90% of graduated students were able to find jobs after one year graduation.
